text: w'idha talab 'ahad min almushrikin aladhin astbyht dmawhm wa'amwalihim aldukhul fi jwark -ayha alrswl- wrghb fi alaman, fajbh 'iilaa talabih hataa yasmae alquran alkarim wyttale ealaa hdayth, thuma 'aeidh min hayth 'ataa amnana; wdhlk li'iiqamat alhujat elyh; dhlk bsbb 'ana alkufaar qawm jahilun bhqayq al'islam, frbma akhtarwh 'iidha zal aljahl enhm
